option-uninstall-description: uninstall tab-completion script and configuration, warning this will remove the functionality system-wide
option-reinstall-description: reinstall tab-completion script, will ask you again what type you want to install
option-reset-cache-description: remove tab-completion cache files from tmp folder
info-toggle: Tab-completion was already {{enabled}} for this project
info-toggle-update: Tab-completion is now {{enabled}} for this project
info-toggle-use-in-project: Use `npx @magnolia/cli jumpstart` to create a project, then:
- To enable the tab-completion inside a project run: `npm run mgnl -- tab-completion`
- To disable the tab-completion inside a project run: `npm run mgnl -- tab-completion -d`
info-script-reopen-terminal: You may need to re-open your shell for changes to take effect
info-recreate-script-future: If you'd like to recreate the script in the future, run the `npm run mgnl -- tab-completion` command
info-removed-no-cache: No tab-completion cache files found in {{path}}
info-uninstall: Uninstallation of tab-completion scrips will disable tab-completion in every project
If you'd like to re-install the script in the future, run `npm run mgnl -- tab-completion` command
info-script-not-found: Tab-completion script not found in {{path}}, probably is already removed
info-loader-script-not-found: No tab_completion loader script not found in {{path}}, probably is already removed
info-removal-from-script: Following content will be removed from {{path}}:
info-v4-configured: You have tab-completion for Magnolia CLI v4 installed
To install tab-completion for Magnolia CLI v5 you need to firstly remove the old configuration
Do you want to remove the old configuration?
info-v4-not-removed: You can still add local tab-completion configuration from CLI v5 in next step
If you prefer global tab-completion configuration or both
please remove the tab-completion of CLI v4 with `npx @magnolia/cli@4 tab-completion uninstall` or manually.
Followed by `npm run mgnl -- tab-completion -r` to reinstall the script
warn-not-confirmed-removal: You didn't confirm the removal uninstallation may not be completed
you may encounter errors you may need to remove it manually from here:
warn-script-added: An error occurred while adding tab-completion script to "{{path}}", error: {{errorMsg}}
warn-intellij-issue: Tab-completion won't work in JetBrains IDEs when the 'New Terminal' feature is enabled. Disable it to restore tab-completion functionality for Magnolia CLI.
error-missing-deps: To use tab-completion you must first install them.
error-v4-removal: Seems like the removal was did not finish successfully
inquirer-confirm-script-recreation: The content of {{path}} is different than expected, do you want to recreate it?
inquirer-confirm-script-removal: Please confirm removal of the content:
inquirer-confirm-v4-removal: Do you want to remove the configuration of Magnolia CLI v4 tab-completion?
inquirer-choose-install-type: Which tab completion installation do you want?
inquirer-choose-install-type-local: Local only (using: `npm run mgnl` or `yarn mgnl` command)
